channel.title: this is FILTHY - Articles
channel.description: Filthy is a global lifestyle brand, magazine, and fashion studio based in Seattle.

item.title: Welcome, this is FILTHY
item.description: This is the soft launch of this is FILTHY a periodical at the intersection of music, art, design, fashion and tech. We also make things. We’re also going live with this minimum viable product, so I’m looking forward to your feedback as we test out this magazine-as-a-design-studio concept.
